author: sdeboy
msg: Added save capability - saves all entries for current tab (even those currently filtered).  ThrowableInformation and LoggingEvent constructors were modified to accept a string[] because reconstructing a loggingevent with an exception by generating a new throwable added the xmldecoder's stack to the throwable's trace..

author: sdeboy
msg: Added save capability - saves all entries for current tab (even those currently filtered).  ThrowableInformation and LoggingEvent constructors were modified to accept a string[] because reconstructing a loggingevent with an exception by generating a new throwable added the xmldecoder's stack to the throwable's trace..

author: psmith
msg: no need to display the logo within a swing component, the HTML
Also decreased the inset side fractionally, looked a bit too large.

author: psmith
msg: Modified Welcome HTML to show the logo inside the HTML, rather than
through Swing.  Also moved that location of the logo over to the right
to bring the text higher.  This looks nicer, to me anyway.
